title: Power Cuts : 3-hours & 20-minutes daily from 25th to 27th April
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Public Utilities COmmission of Sri LankaL approved power cuts for 25th to 27th April for 3 hours & 20 minutes as follows.
Power Cuts : 3-hours & 20-minutes daily from 25th to 27th April
From University to Galle Face: IUSF stages large protest against President, Government
Blocking roads is disproportionate response to non violent protest: HRCSL
